stateDiagram

GAME_INIT

GAME_INIT : GAME_INIT

GAME_INIT : enter / #123; gameAdapter.InitializeGame()#59; #125;

GAME_INIT : exit / #123; gameAdapter.NotifyGameInitialized()#59; #125;

DEALING

DEALING : DEALING

DEALING : enter / #123; gameAdapter.DealCards()#59; #125;

DEALING : exit / #123; gameAdapter.NotifyCardsDealt()#59; #125;

TRUMP_SELECTION

TRUMP_SELECTION : TRUMP_SELECTION

TRUMP_SELECTION : enter / #123; gameAdapter.FlipTrumpCard()#59; #125;

TRUMP_SELECTION : exit / #123; gameAdapter.NotifyTrumpDetermined()#59; #125;

ROUND_END

ROUND_END : ROUND_END

ROUND_END : enter / #123; gameAdapter.CalculateAcesAndTens()#59; #125;

ROUND_END : enter / #123; gameAdapter.CalculateRoundScores()#59; #125;

ROUND_END : exit / #123; gameAdapter.NotifyRoundEnded()#59; #125;

GAME_OVER

GAME_OVER : GAME_OVER

GAME_OVER : enter / #123; gameAdapter.DeclareWinner()#59; #125;

GAME_OVER : exit / #123; gameAdapter.NotifyGameOver()#59; #125;

TIMER_TIMEOUT

TIMER_TIMEOUT : TIMER_TIMEOUT

TIMER_TIMEOUT : enter / #123; gameAdapter.DeductTimeoutPoints()#59; #125;

TIMER_TIMEOUT : exit / #123; gameAdapter.ResetPlayerTimer()#59; #125;

state GAMEPLAY {

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as GAMEPLAY.(InitialState)

        PLAYER_TURN

        PLAYER_TURN : PLAYER_TURN

        PLAYER_TURN : enter / #123; gameAdapter.StartPlayerTimer()#59; #125;

        PLAYER_TURN : exit / #123; gameAdapter.StopPlayerTimer()#59; #125;

        OPPONENT_RESPONSE

        OPPONENT_RESPONSE : OPPONENT_RESPONSE

        OPPONENT_RESPONSE : enter / #123; gameAdapter.ProcessOpponentResponses()#59; #125;

        TRICK_RESOLUTION

        TRICK_RESOLUTION : TRICK_RESOLUTION

        TRICK_RESOLUTION : enter / #123; gameAdapter.ResolveTrick()#59; #125;

        MELD_OPPORTUNITY

        MELD_OPPORTUNITY : MELD_OPPORTUNITY

        MELD_OPPORTUNITY : enter / #123; gameAdapter.ProcessMeldOpportunity()#59; #125;

        MELD_SCORING

        MELD_SCORING : MELD_SCORING

        MELD_SCORING : enter / #123; gameAdapter.ScoreMeld()#59; #125;

        CARD_DRAW

        CARD_DRAW : CARD_DRAW

        CARD_DRAW : enter / #123; gameAdapter.DrawCards()#59; #125;

        DECK_CHECK

        DECK_CHECK : DECK_CHECK

        DECK_CHECK : enter / #123; gameAdapter.CheckDeck()#59; #125;

        state LAST_9_CARDS {

                L9_PLAYER_TURN

                L9_PLAYER_TURN : L9_PLAYER_TURN

                L9_PLAYER_TURN : enter / #123; gameAdapter.StartPlayerTimer()#59; #125;

                L9_PLAYER_TURN : exit / #123; gameAdapter.StopPlayerTimer()#59; #125;

                L9_OPPONENT_RESPONSE

                L9_OPPONENT_RESPONSE : L9_OPPONENT_RESPONSE

                L9_OPPONENT_RESPONSE : enter / #123; gameAdapter.ProcessL9OpponentResponses()#59; #125;

                L9_TRICK_RESOLUTION

                L9_TRICK_RESOLUTION : L9_TRICK_RESOLUTION

                L9_TRICK_RESOLUTION : enter / #123; gameAdapter.ResolveL9Trick()#59; #125;

                L9_TRICK_CHECK

                L9_TRICK_CHECK : L9_TRICK_CHECK

                L9_TRICK_CHECK : enter / #123; gameAdapter.CheckL9TrickComplete()#59; #125;

                L9_TIMER_TIMEOUT

                L9_TIMER_TIMEOUT : L9_TIMER_TIMEOUT

                L9_TIMER_TIMEOUT : enter / #123; gameAdapter.DeductTimeoutPoints()#59; #125;

                L9_TIMER_TIMEOUT : exit / #123; gameAdapter.ResetPlayerTimer()#59; #125;

                %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                state "." as LAST_9_CARDS.(InitialState)

        }

}

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

GAME_INIT --> DEALING : Initialized

DEALING --> TRUMP_SELECTION : CardsDealt

TRUMP_SELECTION --> GAMEPLAY : TrumpDetermined

ROUND_END --> GAME_INIT : ContinueGame

ROUND_END --> GAME_OVER : WinningScoreReached

TIMER_TIMEOUT --> PLAYER_TURN : TimerReset

GAMEPLAY.(InitialState) --> PLAYER_TURN

PLAYER_TURN --> OPPONENT_RESPONSE : CardPlayed

PLAYER_TURN --> TIMER_TIMEOUT : TimerExpired

OPPONENT_RESPONSE --> TRICK_RESOLUTION : TrickComplete

OPPONENT_RESPONSE --> PLAYER_TURN : MorePlayersNeedToPlay

TRICK_RESOLUTION --> MELD_OPPORTUNITY : TrickResolved

TRICK_RESOLUTION --> GAME_OVER : WinningScoreReached

MELD_OPPORTUNITY --> MELD_SCORING : MeldDeclared

MELD_OPPORTUNITY --> CARD_DRAW : MeldSkipped

MELD_SCORING --> CARD_DRAW : MeldScored

MELD_SCORING --> GAME_OVER : WinningScoreReached

CARD_DRAW --> DECK_CHECK : CardsDrawn

DECK_CHECK --> LAST_9_CARDS : DeckEmpty

DECK_CHECK --> PLAYER_TURN : MoreCardsAvailable

L9_PLAYER_TURN --> L9_OPPONENT_RESPONSE : CardPlayed

L9_PLAYER_TURN --> L9_TIMER_TIMEOUT : TimerExpired

L9_OPPONENT_RESPONSE --> L9_TRICK_RESOLUTION : TrickComplete

L9_OPPONENT_RESPONSE --> L9_PLAYER_TURN : MorePlayersNeedToPlay

L9_TRICK_RESOLUTION --> L9_TRICK_CHECK : TrickResolved

L9_TRICK_RESOLUTION --> GAME_OVER : WinningScoreReached

L9_TRICK_CHECK --> L9_PLAYER_TURN : ContinueLastNine

L9_TRICK_CHECK --> ROUND_END : AllHandsEmpty

L9_TIMER_TIMEOUT --> L9_PLAYER_TURN : TimerReset

LAST_9_CARDS.(InitialState) --> L9_PLAYER_TURN

ROOT.(InitialState) --> GAME_INIT
Events
